title: DAOKit Process Lease Contract
description: Canonical lease register used to preserve ownership across succession events.

schema_version.description: Contract version for backward-safe lease parsing.

leases.description: Active and historical lease records owned by orchestrator lanes.

updated_at.description: UTC timestamp when the lease register was last mutated.

lane.description: Logical execution lane for this lease.

step_id.description: Step currently guarded by this lease.

task_id.description: Task identifier associated with the lease.

run_id.description: Run identifier associated with the lease.

thread_id.description: Controller or worker thread identifier owning the lease.

pid.description: Operating system process id that owns the lease token.

lease_token.description: Opaque token required for renew/release/takeover operations.

expiry.description: UTC timestamp when this lease becomes invalid without renewal.

last_heartbeat_at.description: Most recent heartbeat timestamp associated with this lease.

created_at.description: UTC timestamp when this lease record was created.

updated_at.description: UTC timestamp when this lease record was last updated.
